description: Top Bahadur Rayamajhi is a Nepalese politician who has served as the Deputy Prime Minister of Nepal. He has held several ministerial portfolios, including Minister of Energy, Water Resources and Irrigation, Minister for Physical Planning and Constructions, Minister of Local Development, and Minister of Peace and Reconstruction. A member of the Constituent Assembly, he later became the secretary of the CPN (UML) party. In May 2023, an arrest warrant was issued against him for his alleged involvement in a fake Bhutanese refugees scam, which led to his suspension from the party and subsequent arrest.
short_description: Top Bahadur Rayamajhi is a Nepalese politician, former Deputy Prime Minister of Nepal, and secretary of CPN (UML).
